DOC.brief_summary: Patients pancreatic cancer often suffer pain . Because pain , quality life seriously deteriorate . There study show effect pain control hyperthermia ( heat patient 's body ) . However , several limitation conventional hyperthermia . In previous pilot study ( NCT02150135 ) , find improvement quality life , function , symptom . From background , investigator try show effect `` Oncothermia '' conventional chemotherapy pain control , increase quality life , anti-tumor treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Multicenter RCT Clinical Effectiveness Oncothermia With Chemotherapy Metastatic Pancreatic Cancer Patients
DOC.criteria: Patients pathologically confirm pancreatic adenocarcinoma Patients radiologically identify metastasis ( CT MRI ) Patients history previous chemotherapy Patients ECOG score 02 Patients experience hyperthermia treatment Patients difficulty sense heat Patients skin graft breast reconstruction surgery Patients cardiac pacemaker implant metal Pregnant breast feed woman Patients uncontrolled infection , diabetes , hypertension , ischemic heart disease , myocardial infarct within 6 month Patients treat unproved drug within 30 day Patients serious disease affect person 's safety Patients consent study
